"Outstanding work from this company." "They are always professional, dependable, and deliver high-quality work." WinterGreen Synthetic Grass LLC

We’ve had the privilege of working with The Playground Shade and Surfacing Depot for several years now, and Shane and his team are absolutely top-notch. They are always professional, dependable, and deliver high-quality work. … More

The Playground Shade and Surfacing Depot did an exceptional job with the installation of the pouring pad surfacing on both our Infant/Toddler and Preschool playground.  Their commitment to ensuring that we were satisfied customers with both … More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you so much Shyra and it was a pleasure working with you and your Team at The University of Texas at Dallas - Callier Center for Communication Disorders.  We were honored to be a part of your beautiful campus.

Outstanding work from this company. I have used them for both of my Childcare centers and they have done outstanding work. -Gwen Seivley Owner ABC Son Shine School and The Son Rise School Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you so much for your kind words and trusting us multiple times with your projects.  It has a been a pleasure working with your Staff.
